head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PIORE, EMANUEL R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PIORE, EMANUEL R.

block.p: PIORE-Emanuel R. On May 9, 2000. Age 92. After a long illness. Retired Vice President, Director and Chief Scientist, the IBM Company. Beloved husband of Nora, loving father of Michael, Margot Onek & Jane Gilman, cherished grandfather of David, Adam, Matthew, Sarah, Ana and Timothy. Family service Thursday, 1 PM at ''The Riverside'', 76 St and Amsterdam Avenue. A memorial service will be held at a later date.
